mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select p_title, p_img, p_type ,REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE( REVERSE(TO_CHAR(p_price)), '([0-9]{3})','\1,')), '^,','') AS p_price from product where p_type='c' order by dbms_random.value ) a) where rnum between 1 and 4
